author: Baha'u'llah
source_text:
(٢٩) ﴿ يَا ابْنَ الوُجُودِ ﴾
لَا تَنْسِبْ إِلَى نَفْسٍ مَا لَا تُحِبُّهُ لِنَفْسِكَ، وَلَا تَقُلْ مَا لَا تَفْعَل. هَذَا أَمْرِي عَلَيْكَ فَاعْمَلْ بِهِ.
translation:
(29) O SON OF BEING!
Ascribe not to any soul that which thou wouldst not have ascribed to thee, and say not that which thou doest not. This is My command unto thee, do thou observe it.
